alert.note: Alert for Nye (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued March 10 at 2:59PM PST until March 10 at 9:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: The National Weather Service in Elko has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Rain and Snowmelt in... Nye County in south central Nevada... * Until 900 PM PST Friday. * At 259 PM PST, county dispatch reported rain falling on existing snowpack was generating flash flooding from excessive runoff. HAZARD...Flash flooding from rain and snowmelt. SOURCE...County dispatch. IMPACT...Flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other drainage and low lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Reese River Valley as well as State Route 21. Flooding is occurring along the Along the Reese River and State Route 21. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
